text.College of Community Innovation and Educ: College of Community Innovation and Education
text.School of Global Health Management and I: School of Global Health Management and Informatics

courseSection0.text1:
Complete the following: 
HSA3111 - U.S. Health Care Systems (3)
HSC4201 - Community Health (3)
HSA4180 - Organization & Management for Health Agencies I (3)
HSA4191 - Fundamentals of Health Information Technology (3)
HSC4500 - Epidemiology (3)
courseSection0.text2:
Restricted Electives:

Additional prerequisite courses may be required
courseSection0.text3:
Complete at least 1 of the following: 
HSC4652 - Health Law and Ethics (3)
HSA4109 - Principles of Healthcare Reimbursement, Insurance, and Managed Care Plans (3)
HIM4508C - Quality Management (3)
HSA4702 - Health Sciences Research Methods (3)

li.A minimum GPA of 2.5 is required in all: A minimum GPA of 2.5 is required in all coursework, and a minimum grade of "C" (2.0) is required in all courses for the minor.
li.At least 15 hours used in the minor must: At least 15 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the Health Management and Informatics Department.
li.No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit): No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.
li.Internship or Independent Study credit c: Internship or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.

courseSection1.text:
Other Requirements

A minimum GPA of 2.5 is required in all coursework, and a minimum grade of "C" (2.0) is required in all courses for the minor.
At least 15 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the Health Management and Informatics Department.
No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.
Internship or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.
